biotools.summary: This tool facilitates batch effects analysis and correction in high-throughput experiments. It was developed primarily for mass-spectrometry based proteomics (DIA/SWATH). The package contains functions for diagnostics (proteome-wide and feature-level), correction (normalization and batch effects correction) and quality control. Non-linear fitting based approaches were also included to deal with complex, mass spectrometry-specific signal drifts.
